User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the Face Ride Entertainment Wiki application.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the User entity, matching Firebase Auth UID.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

WikiEntry.title: WikiEntry
WikiEntry.description: Represents a wiki entry in the Face Ride Entertainment Wiki application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the WikiEntry entity.

content.description: Content of the wiki entry, stored in Markdown format.

authorId.description: Reference to the User who created the wiki entry. (Relationship: User 1:N WikiEntry)

authorDisplayName.description: The display name of the author, denormalized for direct use.

authorPhotoURL.description: The photo URL of the author, denormalized for direct use.

createdAt.description: Date and time when the wiki entry was created.

updatedAt.description: Date and time when the wiki entry was last updated.

imageUrl.description: URL for the wiki entry's header image.

tagIds.description: References to Tags associated with the wiki entry. (Relationship: Tag N:N WikiEntry)

lastEditorId.description: Reference to the User who last edited the wiki entry.

lastEditorDisplayName.description: The display name of the last editor, denormalized for direct use.

lastEditorPhotoURL.description: The photo URL of the last editor, denormalized for direct use.

Tag.title: Tag
Tag.description: Represents a tag that can be associated with wiki entries.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Tag entity.

Associate.title: Associate
Associate.description: Represents an associate of Face Ride Entertainment.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Associate entity.

description.description: A brief description of the associate.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. User documents are private to the user for reads, but admins can list all users. Includes a 'role' field for application logic and security.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

definition.description: Stores wiki entries. Includes denormalized 'authorId' for authorization independence.

params.name: wikiEntryId
params.description: The unique identifier for the wiki entry.

definition.description: Stores tags associated with wiki entries.

params.name: tagId
params.description: The unique identifier for the tag.

definition.description: Stores information about Face Ride Entertainment associates.

params.name: associateId
params.description: The unique identifier for the associate.
